attributes.action: We propose a speed camera and/or more signage on the A467 bypass
attributes.background: After an unfortunate few months, a number of lives have been lost and people injured on this bypass that we believe are due to an unawareness of the speed limit on the road.  As a local community it has become an increasing concern to us regarding the dangers to those who drive on it.

rejection.details:
Roads in Wales are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

The Welsh Government is responsible for motorways and trunk roads in Wales.

Local councils are responsible for smaller roads. You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
